Package org.microbean.type

Class Types

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.type.Types
public final class Types
extends Object
A hub for Java Type-related operations.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
toTypes(Type)
Thread Safety:
Instances of this class are safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

  • Method Details

    • normalize

      public static final Type normalize​(Type type)
      For the vast majority of cases, returns the supplied Type unchanged, but in the case where a raw Class is supplied, returns an equivalent ParameterizedType whose actual type arguments are not resolved.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type to normalize; may be null in which case null will be returned; will often be returned unchanged
      Returns:
      the normalized Type; null if type was null
      Nullability:
      This method may return null only if the supplied Type is null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • resolve

      public static final Type resolve​(Type type, Function<? super Type,​? extends Type> typeResolver)
      Resolves the supplied Type and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type to resolve; may be null
      typeResolver - the Function whose Function.apply(Object) method will be called on, among other things, ParameterizedType type arguments; must not be null
      Returns:
      the resolved Type, or null
      See Also:
      resolve(Type, Function, boolean)
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • resolve

      public static final Type resolve​(Type type, Function<? super Type,​? extends Type> typeResolver, boolean normalize)
      Resolves the supplied Type and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type to resolve; may be null
      typeResolver - the Function whose Function.apply(Object) method will be called on, among other things, ParameterizedType type arguments; must not be null
      normalize - whether the normalize(Type) method should be called on the supplied Type
      Returns:
      the resolved Type, or null
      Since:
      0.0.3
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • toTypes

      public static final TypeSet toTypes​(Type type)
      Returns a non-null, unmodifiable Set of Types, each element of which is a Type which any instance bearing the supplied Type will implement.

      The Set that is returned is guaranteed to not contain WildcardType or TypeVariable instances.

      Parameters:
      type - the Type whose type closure should be computed; may be null
      Returns:
      a non-null TypeSet Set} of Types; the supplied Type will be one of its elements unless it is a TypeVariable or a WildcardType
      See Also:
      toTypes(Type, Predicate, boolean)
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent.
      Nullability:
      This method never returns null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • toTypes

      public static final TypeSet toTypes​(Type type, boolean normalize)
      Returns a non-null, unmodifiable Set of Types, each element of which is a Type which any instance bearing the supplied Type will implement.

      The Set that is returned is guaranteed to not contain WildcardType or TypeVariable instances.

      Parameters:
      type - the Type whose type closure should be computed; may be null
      normalize - whether the normalize(Type) method should be called on the supplied Type (provided it is not a raw Class)
      Returns:
      a non-null TypeSet Set} of Types; the supplied Type will be one of its elements unless it is a TypeVariable or a WildcardType
      Since:
      0.0.3
      See Also:
      toTypes(Type, Predicate, boolean)
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent.
      Nullability:
      This method never returns null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • toTypes

      public static final TypeSet toTypes​(Type type, Predicate<? super Type> removalPredicate)
      Returns a non-null, unmodifiable Set of Types, each element of which is a Type which any instance bearing the supplied Type will implement.

      The Set that is returned is guaranteed to not contain WildcardType or TypeVariable instances.

      If the supplied Predicate returns true from an invocation of its Predicate.test(Object) method, then the Type that was passed to it will not be contained by the returned TypeSet.

      Parameters:
      type - the Type whose type closure should be computed; may be null
      removalPredicate - a Predicate used to selectively remove some Types from the computed TypeSet; may be null
      Returns:
      a non-null TypeSet Set} of Types, filtered by the supplied Predicate
      See Also:
      toTypes(Type, Predicate, boolean)
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent.
      Nullability:
      This method never returns null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • toTypes

      public static final TypeSet toTypes​(Type type, Predicate<? super Type> removalPredicate, boolean normalize)
      Returns a non-null, unmodifiable Set of Types, each element of which is a Type which any instance bearing the supplied Type will implement.

      The Set that is returned is guaranteed to not contain WildcardType or TypeVariable instances.

      If the supplied Predicate returns true from an invocation of its Predicate.test(Object) method, then the Type that was passed to it will not be contained by the returned TypeSet.

      Parameters:
      type - the Type whose type closure should be computed; may be null
      removalPredicate - a Predicate used to selectively remove some Types from the computed TypeSet; may be null
      normalize - whether the normalize(Type) method should be called on the supplied Type (provided it is not a raw Class)
      Returns:
      a non-null TypeSet Set} of Types, filtered by the supplied Predicate
      Since:
      0.0.3
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent.
      Nullability:
      This method never returns null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • box

      public static final <T extends Type> T box​(T type)
      Returns the result of boxing conversion on the supplied Type.

      In most cases this means the supplied Type is returned unchanged.

      This method calls isPrimitive(Type) as part of its execution.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the kind of Type in question
      Parameters:
      type - the Type to test
      Returns:
      the result of boxing conversion on the supplied Type
      See Also:
      isPrimitive(Type)
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method will return null if type is null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • isPrimitive

      public static final boolean isPrimitive​(Type type)
      Returns true if and only if type is a Class and is primitive.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type to test; may be null in which case false will be returned
      Returns:
      true if and only if type is a Class and is primitive
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • isClass

      public static final boolean isClass​(Type type)
      Returns true if the supplied Type is an instance of Class.

      Design Notes

      This prosaic method exists because various Predicates need to exist that test this very thing, and making it public does no harm.

      Parameters:
      type - the Type in question; may be null in which case false will be returned
      Returns:
      true if and only if type is an instance of Class
      Since:
      0.0.6
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • isRawClass

      public static final boolean isRawClass​(Type type)
      Returns true if and only if the supplied Type is a raw Class.

      This method returns true if:

      • The supplied Type is an instance of Class, and any of the following conditions is true:
        • The return value of invoking this method on the class' component type is true
        • The class has type parameters
      Parameters:
      type - the Type in question; may be null in which case false will be returned
      Returns:
      true if and only if the supplied Type is a raw Class

    • toClass

      public static final Class<?> toClass​(Type type)
      Does what is necessary to extract a Class from the supplied Type if at all possible.
      • If a Class is supplied, the Class is simply returned.
      • If a ParameterizedType is supplied, the result of invoking toClass(Type) on its raw type is returned.
      • If a GenericArrayType is supplied, the result of invoking toClass(Type) on its generic component type is returned.
      • If a TypeVariable is supplied, the result of invoking toClass(Type) on its first bound is returned (if it has one) or Object.class if it does not. Any other bounds are ignored.
      • If a WildcardType is supplied, the result of invoking toClass(Type) on its first upper bound is returned. Any other bounds are ignored.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type for which a Class is to be returned; may be null in which case null will be returned
      Returns:
      a Class, or null if a suitable raw type could not be determined
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by mutltiple threads.

    • toSerializableType

      public static final Serializable toSerializableType​(Type type)
